oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Interview and Performance - Memories of Buck,Bonnie Owens and Merle Haggard - 2012-11-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Memories of Buck Owens; Bonnie Owens and Merle Haggard; Interview and performances with Buddy Alan Owens; Michael Owens; John Owens; Mel Owens from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 10, 2012. Companion to a Bakersfield Music exhibit.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Alan Owens; Michael Owens; John Owens; Mel Owens;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hosted by Michael Gray. Includes audio from video. Performances include; Stop The World And Let Me Off (Buddy Alan Owens); Think Of Me (Buddy Alan Owens); Love's Gonna Live Here Again (Buddy Alan Owens); The Streets Of Bakersfield (Buddy Alan Owens and John Owens);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Owens, Bonnie; Owens, Buck, 1929-2006; Haggard, Merle; Owens, Buddy Alan; Owens, Michael; Owens, John; Owens, Mel; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
